intro.title: Planning Poker Online
intro.desc: Speed up development process of your agile teams. Play on desktop or mobile.

item1.title: Spacer for every project or company
item1.desc: Just like in Slack – every space is your environment.

item2.title: Teams for everyone
item2.desc: Invite and assign people to as many teams as you need.

item3.title: On any device – mobile and desktop
item3.desc: Chpokify is available on any platform with browser.

integrations.title: Connect to all your favorite services

registerBlock.title: 1. Register and get your own space
registerBlock.desc:
When you sign up, we create a cozy space for you and your teammates.
    In that space you will have everything you need to create stories and
    estimate them. You can have as many spaces you need for different projects or companies.

inviteBlock.title: 2. Invite people and team them up
inviteBlock.desc:
Invite people to your space in a second. No more stuttering registrations for
        your co-workers – we'll auto-register
        them by invite. Have a big team? Assign invited people to teams at any time.

startSessionBlock.title: 3. Start session and create stories
startSessionBlock.desc: Create a poker session dedicated to sprint that you've planned and fill it with stories.

voteModerateBlock.title: 4. Vote, moderate
voteModerateBlock.desc:
Control the field. Decide, when and which team is going to vote right now.
        Got different or wrong results? Discuss with team, take notes and reset or revote if needed.

analyzeBlock.title: 5. Finalize, analyze
analyzeBlock.desc:
Ready to finish sprint estimate session? Nicely done!
    Create reports of team's progress during the sprints history and review other statistics.

extra.title: Chpokify UI
extra.darkModeDesc:
We know that you may work till late, just like we do.
 Therefore, we made a dark mode. Switch to it and keep your eyes healthy.
extra.designSystemDesc:
With our brand new design-system
 Chpokify UI you'll get a new level of sensations.

kanbanThumb.title: Create your first board
kanbanThumb.description: Boards visually depict work at various stages of a process using cards to represent work items and columns to represent each stage of the process.

retroThumb.title: Retro is in development
retroThumb.description:
We appreciate your interest to our new module, and we’re sure that you’ll have fun when its released!

You can support us while waiting.

step.content: 🎉 Welcome to your freshly made space! Please allow to demonstrate what you can do here. You can skip tutorial any time and get back to it later (or never). 🚀 Get started!
Here you see all the people in your space. It's only you here. Feeling 😥 lonely?
Let's invite someone! Click the button to send invites.

Invite people via email or by sending them an invite link. Fun fact: invite via email is the easiest way for people to join since they only need to create password for their account. Alright, send a link or email invitation to your teammates. ✉️
Here you see all the teams in your space. ⛹️ Teams is the best way to organise people. For example, you can create teams according to your company structure: Front-end, Back-end, QA, etc.
Okay, it's time for a new team! Click the button to create one.

Create first team. Name your team and assign people to it. Assign yourself if you're going to vote along with the others. As an 👑 administrator, you can spectate and manage any session without being a part of a team. Members can play only when they are part of a team.
Click on the team to edit it and re-assign people any time. Even during a poker session.
🕹️ Ready to play? Click the button to create a new session.
Name your session (or don't) and add description if needed.
Teams are essential to play poker. Select those that will participate in the session.

integrationsSpacePromo.title: Integrations
integrationsSpacePromo.description: Connect software to your Chpokify account to be able to import/export tasks from there.

jiraIntegration.title: How to connect JIRA to Chpokify?
jiraIntegration.videoTitle: How to connect JIRA to Chpokify?

teamAssist.one: Chpokify team will gladly assist you to set up your JIRA.
teamAssist.two: so we can arrange video call (Eastern European Time Zone).

jiraIntegration.contactAdministrator: You will need to contact or be an administrator of your JIRA system in order to complete this integration. If you are not an administrator of your JIRA instance you can share the values and the instructions below. Remember to add your JIRA URL at the bottom of this page to link the account once you have completed the setup in JIRA.

step1.title: 1. Create and set up JIRA application link
step1.adminSettings: 1.1 As JIRA administrator, go to “Settings”, then “Application links”.
step1.enterUrl: 1.2 Enter the Application URL then press “Create new link”.
step1.pressContinue: 1.3 In the “Configure Application URL” modal window just press “Continue”.
step1.fillNameNadType: 1.4 In the “Link applications” modal window copy and paste Chpokify to Application Name and choose Generic Application (usually selected by default), and then press “Continue”.
step1.hint: There will be other fields on this form in JIRA but ignore those for now.

step2.title: 2. Incoming authentications settings
step2.clickPencil: 2.1 After completeing the first step, you’ll see the “Chpokify” line appeared in the table. Click pencil icon on the right.
step2.configure: 2.2 In the “Configure Chpokify” modal window select “Incoming Authentication” and copy and paste all the settings below, and then press “Save”. Keep in mind that this modal window has many options, so you have to scroll down to see them.

step3.title: 3. Link JIRA to Chpokify
step3.description: Paste your JIRA URL (ex: https://myaccount.atlassian.net) and finally press “Link”.
